tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Surgical Tooth Extraction,Dental Fillings,Dental Cleaning,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental Implant Fixing,
review:
To begin with I am one person who is extremely scared for carrying out any dental procedures . Because of my fear I have visited a dentist for the second time until the age of 32 and my last visit was over a decade back. Cause of negligence in visiting a good dentist I had multiple issues before I visited Dr Raunak. 

In my first 1-2 sittings I was very scared cause I knew I needed a root canal , a tooth extraction and few fillings. The best part of the whole thing is it’s been like overall 4 sittings so far and I am kind of through with fixing most of my dental issues. 

Right in the consultation sitting Dr Raunak explained to me what were the issues with my respective teeth. He not only explained me what procedures were required but he actually kept me updated on real time basis while he was performing the procedures so as to what exactly was he doing.  

I always regarded dental implants to be the most scariest thing because it’s like extracting a tooth first drilling inside the bone and fixing a screw.  Had it not been the encouragement and confidence from Dr Raunak I doubt I would have ever done an implant in my life . 

Be it my root canal, implant, extraction, fillings, cleaning all went extremely smooth.

Dr Raunak and Dr Surena manage things skilfully they perfectly know how to educate their clients they ensure client satisfaction is given upmost priority.  The staff working at their clinic are very cordial and caring. 

Thanks a million Doctor Raunak and Doctor Surena.. I am struggling with words to express my gratitude..!
reply_text: Thank you so much for your kind words means a lot.Patient appreciation is all we strive to achieve .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Great experience as always! I am a regular at Innovar. What got me going back was that they make the whole procedure a very comfortable experience, and explain each step of the process clearly and answer all my questions patiently. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a positive dental experience.\

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Firstly, it must be mentioned how fearful I am of any medical procedures. A visit to the dentist tops the list. But meeting with Dr. Raunak put that fear away in a box, and buried it in an unknown location. Doctor was extremely knowledgeable and explained to me very clearly about the diagnosis. Living abroad and visiting dentists there, I was always apprehensive and coming to Innovar dental changed my perception completely. The process was prompt and procedure painless, done with utmost care and professionalism. Thank you doc for putting my fear of dentist’s chair to rest. Cannot recommend you enough. Grateful for your time, patience and expertise. Cheers.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Dental Cleaning,RCT - Root Canal Treatment, Tooth Extraction,Periondontal Care,Dental Implant,
review: What impressed me about Dr. Raunak was not only his impeccable skill and professionalism with which he conducted my dental extraction and implant. It is also his integrity.  He is the first ever doctor who has saved my dollars. Too many times US dentists exaggerated my dental problems to extract more $ from me. Dr. Raunak tells it how it is and told me that a procedure is not needed. Guess what? He was right. He favors patient care over dollars. He truly cares about all his patients. A diamond in the rough. I cannot recommend him enough.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I was having issues with my teeth for many years. I was hesitant to show any of the doctors fearing of How good they are at the work to be done. Also, I was hesitant about the Cost. 
I have been referred Dr. Mehta. At my first visit he made me so comfortable, and with the right suggestion of what need to be done. He along with his wife Mrs. Mehta helped me to bring back the smile on my face. They have also saved my money by not doing unnecessary works which I have been suggested previously by other Dentists. They are best at their profession and also they ensure that the Patient walks out Happily with satisfaction* * ***** *** ******** *** ***** * **** ***** *** *** **** ******* ** *** ***** 
Thank you for bringing the smile on my face.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Wisdom Tooth Extraction,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Implant / RCT,
review:
Have gone to many many dentist. I live in south bombay, but just for my treatment with both Dr Raunak Mehta and Dr Surena Mehta, I travel to andheri for my treatment. 

Great advice, fast and great treatment. 

Dr raunak - My extraction and implant was done in 30 mins, (something most other dentist take 2 appts for). NO PAIN OR SWELLING after treatment.

Dr Surena- very very gentle touch. She did my root canal so so well even though it was a curved canal! 

I hate traveling in bombay, but because of how good these 2 doctors are, I don’t mind traveling to get it done.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
very efficient and professionally competent doctors--explained problems and solutions in very lucid and clear terms ---made me feel very comfortable and set my mind  at rest for the apprehensions that I had regarding the dental treatment procedures especially on account of my advanced age and specific health issues of Carotid blockages and heart surgery history.  Thank you both the doctors.  Best wishes  &  God Bless you both and your competent and friendly team.  Happy New Year to all of you.
...........

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: It was an amazing and smooth experience! I was very scared to fix it and kept delaying it until the pain become too much. Dr. Raunak gave me an immediate appointment upon hearing of my pain. Dr. Raunak patiently answered all my questions and made me feel calm. During the surgery process, I was given full comfort and to my surprise the implant was done in less than 25 minutes! Even the recovery was smoother than I had imagined. I am extremely happy and satisfied the way it all turned out. I would recommend him to everyone without a doubt.

review: Good morning Dr. I have taken yesterday & today morning pain killer tablet....but I don't have pain. Should then I continue with taking or should I stop that tablet only....please advise me for the same...Thanks in advance ..

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Dr. Raunak and his team were quite friendly and explained the process very well. From appointment booking to post-process, everything was super easy and convenient. Got the results I wanted and would definitely recommend Dr. Raunak and Innovar to others.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Took trouble to explain the extent of work to be carried out. Explained the payment that would required to be done.  Took the trouble to explain how he would do the work step by step and answered all my queries and doubts. The doctor then fixed an appointment to start the work. I'm satisfied with the work that has been been carried out up to now.

Doctor Raunak definitely knows how to manage a clinic
 His staff is very polite and he sets an example by being very patient ,polite and  helpful in giving the right advice. Will highly recommend hm and will definitely visit again as he advised I would need a root canal . 
The clinic was very clean and all protective measures were followed.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I have had such a great experience at Innovar Dental. Dr. Ranauk & Dr. Surena did a wonderful job with my root canal process. The fact that makes them so good is their way of involving and explaining the patient what is wrong and what needs to be done! Not only them but their staff is also friendly and it makes them very approachable.
And checking on patients after their procedures is something which I found really sweet. 

I 100% recommend Dr.Ranauk's services! You won't be disappointed :)

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Ceramic Crowns and Bridges Fixing,
review: Knowing myself to be a difficult patient in respect to my physical condition Dr Mehta was meticulous in this approach to tackle my root canal with subsequent the hindering wisdom tooth extraction to enable clear & proper capping of the tooth. After each sitting I have received a call from his clinic the following day to check on my wellbeing which I appreciate highly. Would recommend him to all as he is not one of our current regular commerciel minded Doc's. Thank you Dr Mehta.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited Innovar Dental to get my dental cap replaced. Dr Mehta carried out the whole procedure with such precision and perfection. From getting the shade of my teeth right to polishing the shape of the cap till they felt comfortable, he would make sure you're completely and utterly satisfied. His clinic was very clean and all safety measures are implemented.
